name: Hawk
content:
Traits

**Keen Sight**: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

 Actions

**Talons**: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
